about.title: About
about.text1: DRS is a team of passionate engineers who love to create and develop innovative products. We offer a number of digital services ranging from simple applications to complex web systems. If you're interested in collaboration, one of our products, or partnership, feel free to contact us!
about.text3: Our mission is to develop business in designing digital products with a heavy focus on delivering additional value to our clients. In the future, we plan to expand our portfolio of services to IoT, robotics, and automation. The goal is to bring modern technologies closer to those who don't even know they need them!

products.title: Products
products.text111: By working in the fields of project management and manufacturing, we believed that existing solutions lacked the innovation and efficiency required to meet the unique needs of project-oriented companies and small to medium-sized production businesses. Our aim was to make our solutions as simple as possible, avoiding unnecessary features and ensuring clarity and ease of use. Both solutions are customizable and scalable to your needs.
products.usluge5: Project management (tasks, deadlines, visual timelines, KAN-BAN task board, communication, etc.)
products.usluge6: Tracking work hours, expenses, clients, etc.
products.usluge8: Rapid entry of invoices through OCR scanning
products.usluge9: HR module (vacations, business trips, work evidence, etc.)
products.usluge10: And many more! Customizable and scalable depending on your needs!
products.usluge20: Management software for small and medium production companies
products.usluge25: Tracking progress & expenses on every work order
products.usluge28: As a standalone solution or integrated with ERP
